level.text: 804.1 An applicant requesting certification as a resident-owned businessnterprise must provide proof of residency, including but not limited to,ersonal income tax returns, a deed, mortgage, or lease for his or her primaryesidence, a District of Columbia driver’s license or identification card, andtility bills for the residence.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); as amendedy Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009), incorporatingy reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622, 5627 (July0, 2009).
